data.comment: Lucas Perri (Sao Paulo) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match has started at Morumbí.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 4, Bragantino pushes forward through Matheus Jesus, whose finish on goal is saved.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Sao Paulo's area.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 5, Sao Paulo drive upfield and Brenner gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
In the minute 7, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Ytalo of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 8, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Bragantino throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, In Sao Paulo Bragantino's Claudinho is caught offside.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sao Paulo's half?
In the minute 13, Savio Pereira Sampaio blows against Bragantino's Edimar for offside.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
Diego (Sao Paulo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in Bragantino.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 20, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 22, Bragantino to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 24, Sao Paulo's Brenner is whistled for offside at Morumbí.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Morumbí.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 27, Sao Paulo drive forward but Brenner is judged offside.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Sao Paulo's Luciano gets in a shot on goal at Morumbí. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo push forward at Morumbí and Tche Tche gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bragantino defence.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Bragantino.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, Vitor Bueno gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Sao Paulo.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Morumbí.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Sao Paulo's Reinaldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in Bragantino.
Savio Pereira Sampaio will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Sao Paulo.
Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao (Bragantino) is making a first substitution, with Raul replacing Matheus Jesus.
In the minute 46, Paulinho is replacing Gabriel for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Fernando Diniz is making the team's first substitution at Morumbí with Hernanes replacing Vitor Bueno.
Brenner for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 48, Free kick Sao Paulo.
Paulinho for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Bragantino to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Bragantino.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo drives forward and Reinaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 53, Raul scores to make it 0-1 at Morumbí.
Artur with an assist there.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick in a good position for Sao Paulo!
Edimar (Bragantino) has received a first yellow card.
In Sao Paulo, Hernanes (Sao Paulo) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Morumbí.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo drive forward through Juanfran. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 59, Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Sao Paulo.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Edimar for Bragantino who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 61, Bragantino's Edimar looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bragantino just outside Sao Paulo's area.
Bragantino's Claudinho is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Bragantino have been awarded a penalty...
Luciano (Sao Paulo) has received a yellow card from Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Claudinho (Bragantino) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 68, The away team have replaced Leonardo Realpe with Ligger. This is the second substitution made today by Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao.
Helinho is on a sub for Brenner for Sao Paulo.
The home team have replaced Igor Gomes with Gonzalo Carneiro. This is the fourth substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
In the minute 69, Bragantino are pushing forward but Bruno Tubarao's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Bragantino at Morumbí.
Alerrandro is replacing Ytalo for the away team.
In the minute 73, Free kick Sao Paulo.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bragantino's Ricardo Ryller has been booked in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 73, Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao is making the team's fourth substitution at Morumbí with Lucas Evangelista replacing Bruno Tubarao.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 76, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 78, Luciano gets an equalizer for Sao Paulo. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Helinho.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 80, Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Bragantino are in shooting range from this free kick.
Tche Tche for Sao Paulo has been booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, Great shot from Bragantino's Artur but he is denied by the crossbar.
Ricardo Ryller (Bragantino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Bragantino's area.
In the minute 87, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo's Hernanes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Sao Paulo are whistled for offside.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bragantino have been given a penalty...
Paulinho (Sao Paulo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo, Helinho of Sao Paulo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match has come to a close in Sao Paulo. The final score is 1-1.
Leo Pele (Sao Paulo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao (Bragantino) is making a fifth substitution, with Uillian Correia replacing Artur.
